faqs.question: What is the ICEcard app?
faqs.answer: ICEcard (In Case of Emergency Card) is an 'Emergency as a Service (EaSe)' platform and mobile application that securely stores your emergency contact details, medical conditions, allergies and other critical information. It enables first responders and doctors to access this information quickly in case of an emergency, accident, or if you're unconscious due to any health issue.

faqs.question: Who should use the ICEcard app?
faqs.answer: Every individual is encouraged to use the app to ensure essential health, medical and emergency contact information is available when needed—in normal life, office work, during travel, fieldwork or in case of onsite incidents. It's beneficial for students, employees, travelers, people with medical conditions, parents of young children, and caregivers of elderly persons.

faqs.question: How does ICEcard benefit me?
faqs.answer: ICEcard ensures your safety by: (1) Providing instant access to emergency contacts, (2) Displaying your primary health information to first responders or doctors in emergencies, (3) Helping friends, colleagues, HR or admin act quickly during critical situations, and (4) Enhancing social responsibility and wellbeing standards for individuals, students, and employees.

faqs.question: What information can I store in ICEcard?
faqs.answer: You can store: Emergency contact names and numbers, Blood type, allergies and chronic conditions, ongoing medications and health issues, medical prescriptions, Medical and Term insurance details, Family and legacy contact information, Photos of minor children or elderly (Alzheimer patients), Employee ID or company emergency contacts, Vehicle and driver information, and Family doctor details.
alternativeQuestions: What can I add to ICEcard

faqs.question: How does the Face Scan feature work?
faqs.answer: No one needs to touch your phone or wallet. Your face acts as your unique QR code. Any first responder or doctor can use their own phone with the ICEcard app to scan your face and instantly access ONLY the primary health information you've chosen to share publicly. This ensures quick emergency response without compromising your privacy.
alternativeQuestions: How do others access my info

faqs.question: How often should I update my ICEcard details?
faqs.answer: It's recommended to review and update your information whenever there's any change in your health, medication, emergency contacts, medical status, insurance policy, or any other information of concern to you. Regular updates ensure first responders always have accurate, life-saving information.

faqs.question: Is my information safe in the ICEcard app?
faqs.answer: Yes. ICEcard uses Amazon Web Services (AWS) servers and encryption to keep your data secure. We are continuously working to enhance safety and security with blockchain technology. Your data privacy is our top priority.

faqs.question: Does ICEcard share my data with HR or management?
faqs.answer: No. Your data remains private and is not automatically shared with HR or company management unless you choose to provide it voluntarily or in an emergency. When information is accessed for emergency purposes by HR, admin, or any first responder, both you and your emergency contacts are notified with the accessor's name, contact number, date, and time.

faqs.question: Can the information on ICEcard be misused?
faqs.answer: We take all precautions to safeguard your data. When any ICEcard user scans a person's face in an emergency, that scanner's identity and phone number are shared with ICE contacts. Only your primary health info is disclosed to first responders and doctors. We are always working to enhance safety, security, and prevent misuse.

faqs.question: Is using ICEcard mandatory for employees or students?
faqs.answer: Not mandatory, but it is highly recommended as part of employee or student safety protocols and people wellbeing initiatives. We continually enhance wellbeing services. It's especially useful for those who commute daily, travel, work in remote locations, or have known medical conditions.
alternativeQuestions: Do I have to use ICEcard

faqs.question: Can I use ICEcard during travel?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. ICEcard is designed for emergencies anywhere. It helps ensure first responders, colleagues, or any person with the ICEcard app can help you regardless of location. It's useful for hotel staff or visiting business colleagues if any medical condition or emergency happens—they'll know who to contact.

faqs.question: Is there any cost for ICEcard app?
faqs.answer: Presently, there is no cost to employees or students. All features and benefits are as per the agreement with your organization or institution. Any future changes in service, benefits, or cost implications will be communicated by the relevant authorities.

faqs.question: What if I change devices or leave the company?
faqs.answer: If your mobile number remains the same, all data stays with you. You can change profile information if you plan to change organizations or institutes. If you leave, your ICEcard remains yours—you can continue using it privately. If changing mobile numbers, contact ICEcard support for verification or create a new profile with updated data.

faqs.question: Who do I contact for app issues?
faqs.answer: For technical or app-specific issues, reach out to ICEcard's support team via the app or website at https://icecard.in/. For company-related information, contact your admin or HR department.

faqs.question: Is ICEcard compatible with all smartphones?
faqs.answer: ICEcard is available for both Android and iOS platforms. Please ensure your operating system is up to date for the best experience. You can download it from Google Play Store or Apple App Store.

faqs.question: How do I download the ICEcard app?
faqs.answer: You can download ICEcard from: Android - Google Play Store (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rannlab.ice_card.ice_card), iPhone - Apple App Store (https://apps.apple.com/in/app/ice-card-app/id6736453602). Visit our website at https://icecard.in/ for more information.

faqs.question: How do I set up my ICEcard profile?
faqs.answer: After downloading the app, create an account with your mobile number. Then customize your medical profile by adding emergency contacts, blood type, allergies, ongoing medications, insurance details, and any other critical information you want available in emergencies. You control what information is public and what remains private.

faqs.question: What are the key features of ICEcard?
faqs.answer: Key features include: (1) Face Scan for instant emergency info access, (2) Emergency contacts and health information storage, (3) Customizable medical profile, (4) Blood donation requests and donor search, (5) Add profiles for children or elderly without phones, (6) Call/Track ambulance services, (7) Nearby emergency service providers, (8) Vehicle owner contact info, (9) Public and private information controls, and (10) Corporate customization for employee wellbeing.

faqs.question: Can I add my children or elderly parents to ICEcard?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can add profiles for minor children, spouse, or elderly (Alzheimer patients) who don't have mobile phones. If they are lost, any ICEcard user can scan their face and contact you immediately. This feature helps prevent child trafficking and ensures quick reunification with missing loved ones.

faqs.question: How does the blood donation feature work?
faqs.answer: ICEcard allows you to request blood in emergency situations and also register as a blood donor. When someone nearby needs your blood type urgently, you'll be notified. You can also search for blood donors in your area when needed. This creates a community of life-savers ready to help in critical moments.

faqs.question: Can I track ambulances through ICEcard?
faqs.answer: Yes, ICEcard allows you to call and track emergency services including ambulances. You can get support from nearby emergency service providers. Future developments include AI-powered features and drone ambulance services for faster emergency response.

faqs.question: What is the vehicle owner contact feature?
faqs.answer: You can store your vehicle number and driver information in ICEcard. If your vehicle meets with an accident or is wrongly parked, anyone with ICEcard can scan a QR code or use the app to find the vehicle owner's contact details and reach you immediately. This helps in emergency situations and resolving parking issues quickly.

faqs.question: What is legacy contact and critical information feature?
faqs.answer: You can designate family and legacy contacts who will have access to critical information in case of extreme emergencies. This includes term insurance policies, crypto wallets, financial information, or any other valuable data you want your dependents to access if something happens to you. This ensures your loved ones aren't left struggling for critical information.

faqs.question: Can family members also use ICEcard?
faqs.answer: YES! ICEcard is beneficial for every individual—old, young, or child. It is extremely useful and highly recommended to register your minor children and girls who are most vulnerable. Each family member can have their own profile with appropriate emergency information.

faqs.question: What notifications will I receive?
faqs.answer: You and your emergency contacts will receive instant notifications when your face is scanned in an emergency. The notification includes the name, contact number, date, and time of the person who accessed your information. This ensures transparency and allows your contacts to respond quickly to help you.
